data.description: A fresh, creamy and sweet chocolate milk. Farmer's chocolate milk is a refreshing treat and is also an effective post-workout recovery drink. Perfect for cooking, No antibiotics or artificial growth hormones, Milk is a preservative-free dairy product and it is Gluten – Free.

ingredients: Partly Skimmed Milk, Sugar, Cocoa, Salt, Colour, Carrageenan, Artificial Flavour, Vitamin A Palmitate, Vitamin D3.

name: Yoplait Yop 1% Drinkable Yogurt Peach 200 ml

data.description: Yoplait. Delicious, Fun Family Yogurt. Yoplait Yop 1% Drinkable Yogurt features a deliciously smooth texture and a portable format perfect for breakfast on-the-go. Yoplait Yop 1% M.F. Drinkable Yogurt is the on-the-go yogurt you need to keep you going all day. Yoplait Yop 1% M.F. Drinkable Yogurt contains no gelatin, artificial flavours, or added colours. This portable yogurt drink is convenient to add to a lunchbox or gym bag and a good source of calcium & vitamin D. The fresh milk used in Yoplait products is sourced from Canadian dairy farmers and is free of added growth hormones and antibiotics. Contains one 200 mL drinkable yogurt in total.

ingredients: Partly Skimmed Milk (Milk, Vitamin D3), Water, Sugar, Milk Protein, Natural Flavour, Lactase, Bacterial Culture.
